document_data.mainbody:
edric Buckenwing was an inhabitant of the town of Ghars in Cormyr in the midâ€“14 century DR.
Cedric was a buddy of Jasper and other young men in Ghars in the . In Eleint, they got drunk on cheap beer and Cedric challenged Jasper to steal something from the retired War Wizard Benelaius. He agreed and they all rode out together to his cottage. Jasper was caught and later reflected that real friends wouldntve let him be so stupid.
